metadata.title: CVE-2015-8547 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The CoreUserInputHandler::doMode function in core/coreuserinputhandler.cpp in Quassel 0.10.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via the "/op *" command in a query.

criterions.comment: quassel package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2').
